name: Jetpack Doggo 2
description:
What has changed from the first game:

- Cool new way to gain score

- More obstacles

- Improved obstacle spawner

- Upgraded to new Input System

- 16sec looped music track made by me

Art provided by my partner. If you want to influence development of future games developed by me, join the team as a tester or just want to hang around, there is a discord server: https://discord.gg/jkzp3wZQac
